name: shamir-sharing
description: Shamir's Secret Sharing split and restore tool

scripts.build_macos: pkg -t macos -o bin/macos-shamir-split shamir-split.js && pkg -t macos -o bin/macos-shamir-restore shamir-restore.js
scripts.build_linux: pkg -t linux -o bin/linux-shamir-split shamir-split.js && pkg -t linux -o bin/linux-shamir-restore shamir-restore.js
scripts.build_win: pkg -t win -o bin/win-shamir-split shamir-split.js && pkg -t win -o bin/win-shamir-restore shamir-restore.js
scripts.build: npm run build_macos && npm run build_linux && npm run build_win && cd bin && shasum -p -a 256 * > ../checksums/v$(cat ../package.json | jq -r ".version").sha256

author: Themand
